DOC.brief_summary: Treatment of keloids scars is difficult and controversial. These keloids have a functional and aesthetic impact. A lot of treatment are described with a lot of relapses and aggravation. Authors report outcomes of the treatment with shaving and cryosurgery
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Keloids Scars Treated by Shaving and Cryosurgery
DOC.criteria: keloids scare treatment of shaving and cryosurgery immunosuppressive therapy chemotherapy
